persona.name: Truman Morrison
persona.personality: Thoughtful and pragmatic, deeply committed to justice reform and passionate about ensuring fairness in the legal system.
persona.employment: Senior Judge on the D.C. Superior Court
persona.notes: Has nearly 40 years of experience on the bench, advocates for alternatives to cash bail, and emphasizes the importance of assessing risk without relying solely on money.
persona.communication_style: Clear and articulate, often using evidence-based arguments while addressing complex legal issues.
